channel.title: A Java gaming tutorial for total beginers
channel.description:
This is a exelent place to start learning java coding for games
http://www.codelords.net/mambo3/content/view/36/39/
It's where I started and I now run 2personal 2d zelda like games. and have learnt to make rs2 servers really well.

item.title: A Java gaming tutorial for total beginers
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:

I thought they’re all the same? Or maybe he also don’t uses it in C++.

Read full topic

item.title: A Java gaming tutorial for total beginers
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:3, topic:205832”]what you should know is that zstars made it, and he primarily works with c++

meaning, he does a shitty job of teaching java (no offense) and last i checked some of the stuff didnt even compile[/quote]He also doesnt follow the Java naming conventions very well either (no offense) but that’s probably because C++'s is different?

Read full topic
